name: ongoing outbreak
description:
If you find any bug's please comment them.

I know I made this on scratch but it's all I know how to use, and I made this for scratch but i wanted more people to play it. thank you for playing!

After hearing on the news that there has been a zombie outbreak you decide to be a hero and fight them off with your dog Jerry. After a while you realize you have the ability to make the zombies disappear.

you have 4 lives touching a zombie will damage you or cause you to lose a life.

thank you for playing the first ongoing outbreak game, I hope you enjoy it!

Controls: 

W = forward

S = backwards

D = rotate right

A = rotate left

Spacebar = fire/shoot

E = heal (once per minute)

Z = special ability #1

(Please play the game normally before using these) Special Controls:

O = unlock every ability and equip max gun (tommy gun)

P = heal without reload
